description: Red Light Holland Corp. engages in the production, cultivation, and sale of magic truffles to the recreational market in the Netherlands. It is also involved in the selection, distribution, and export of truffles, cannabidiol products, cannabis seeds, headshop products, cannabis bake house muffins, cookies, and cakes. The company sells its products under the iMicrodose and Maka brand name through 74 brick-and-mortar SmartShops, as well as through iMicrodose.nl and various other online stores across the Netherlands. Red Light Holland Corp. is based in Toronto, Ontario.
